chief_complaint: Left knee pain and stiffness s/p total knee arthroplasty POD 2
diagnosis: Status post total knee arthroplasty, left
prior_level_of_function: Independent with all ADLs and IADLs. Walked 1 mile daily for exercise. Drove independently. Worked part-time as consultant.
subjective_notes: Patient reports left knee pain 5/10 at rest, 7/10 with movement. States 'I want to get back to walking my dog.' Slept poorly due to pain. No numbness or tingling. No calf pain or swelling.
objective_findings: A&O x4, follows commands. Left knee: surgical incision clean, dry, intact with staples. Mild edema noted. AROM 5-75 degrees (limited by pain). PROM 0-85 degrees. Strength: hip flexion 3+/5, knee extension 3/5, ankle DF 4/5. Sensation intact. Pulses palpable. Transfers: mod A x1. Ambulation: 25 feet with FWW, CGA, WBAT, min verbal cues for gait pattern.
